properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, 72 PERSONS ON BOARD,
   REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
   LAST KNOWN POSITION AL KHUMS (32-39.2N 014-16.4E)
   AT 260001Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
   PHONE: 2182 1444 6799, 2182 1563 1578,
   FAX: 2182 1360 6868, 2182 1444 6799,
   E-MAIL: SAR@ANS.CAA.GOV.LY,
   SALEM.ELKABIR@CAA.GOV.LY OR
   INTERIM LIBYAN MRCC,
   PHONE: 2182 1444 9488,
   FAX: 2182 1444 9149, 2182 1444 9274,
   E-MAIL: LCG.NAV.ROOM@GMAIL.COM, NHA@LTTNET.NET OR
   LIBYAN NAVY COAST GUARD,
   PHONE: 2182 1444 9488, 2189 2517 9382,
   FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
   E-MAIL: LIBYAN.NAVAL.COMMS.CENTRE@GMAIL.COM OR
   RCC MALTA,
   PHONE: 356 2124 9784,
   FAX: 356 2180 9860,
   E-MAIL: RCCMALTA@GOV.MT OR
   MRCC TUNIS,
   PHONE: 216 7156 0244,
   FAX: 216 7156 1804,
   E-MAIL: TUNISIANNAVY@DEFENCE.TN OR
   MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 4035/18.
